import numpy as np

def update_edge_distance(edge_distance, local_opt_tour, edge_n_used):
    num_nodes = edge_distance.shape[0]
    updated_edge_distance = edge_distance.copy()
    
    # Parameter initialization
    topology_penalty_factor = 1.5
    stochastic_scale_min, stochastic_scale_max = 0.1, 0.9
    frequency_balance_weight = 0.6
    
    # Compute topology-aware penalties based on global connectivity
    for i in range(len(local_opt_tour) - 1):
        u, v = local_opt_tour[i], local_opt_tour[i + 1]
        global_connectivity = np.sum(edge_n_used[u, :]) + np.sum(edge_n_used[v, :])
        penalty = topology_penalty_factor * (1 + np.exp(-global_connectivity / (np.mean(edge_n_used) + 1e-8)))
        updated_edge_distance[u, v] += penalty
        updated_edge_distance[v, u] = updated_edge_distance[u, v]
    
    # Apply stochastic perturbations with adaptive scaling
    stochastic_scale = stochastic_scale_min + (stochastic_scale_max - stochastic_scale_min) * np.random.rand(num_nodes, num_nodes)
    stochastic_perturbation = stochastic_scale * (np.max(edge_n_used) - edge_n_used) / (np.max(edge_n_used) + 1e-8)
    updated_edge_distance += stochastic_perturbation
    
    # Introduce cumulative frequency balancing adjustments
    frequency_balance = frequency_balance_weight * (edge_n_used - np.mean(edge_n_used)) / (np.std(edge_n_used) + 1e-8)
    frequency_balance = np.clip(frequency_balance, -np.inf, 0)  # Ensure only downward adjustments
    updated_edge_distance += frequency_balance
    
    # Ensure no negative distances
    updated_edge_distance = np.maximum(updated_edge_distance, 0)
    
    return updated_edge_distance
